title: Age of Wonders 3 Deluxe Edition (v1.600) (Incl 4 DLC) (GOG)
description:
Includes the full game along with all the GOG.com game goodies.

Install instructions:
1. Run "setup_age_of_wonders3_2.3.0.15"
2. Install "patch_age_of_wonders3_2.4.0.17" found in the "Patch" folder
3. Install the 4 DLC located in the "DLC" folder
4. Play
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

About:
Age of Wonders III is the long anticipated sequel to the award-winning strategy series. Delivering a unique mix of Empire Building, Role Playing and Warfare, Age of Wonders III offers the ultimate in turn-based fantasy strategy for veterans of the series and new players alike! 

Minimum system requirements:
Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8, 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600, 2.4 Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+, 2.6 Ghz (Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600, 2.4 Ghz / AMD Phenom X4 9900, 2.6 Ghz recommended)
Memory: 2 GB RAM (4 GB RAM recommended)
Hard drive space: 10 GB of HD space
Graphics: nVidia 8800 / ATi Radeon HD 3870 with 512 MB or Laptop integrated Intel HD 3000 with 3 GB system RAM (nVidia Geforce 460 1 GB / AMD Radeon HD 6850 1 GB recommended)
Sound card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card, DirectX 9.0c
Screen resolution notice: 1024*786 (1920*1080 recommended), open internet connection for online multiplayer
